description: Main entry point for a Vue.js application setting up the app instance, incorporating plugins (Pinia and Vue Router), and mounting the app to the DOM.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Creates a new Vue application instance with the root component.

methods.name: app.use
methods.description: Registers a plugin or a store with the Vue application.

methods.name: app.mount
methods.description: Mounts the Vue app to a DOM element identified by the selector.
